column1: Patient Narratives

90 year old man with acute right lower chest swelling sincefew months USG report tells no hepatic lesion, no subdiaphragmabscess, CXR shows no soft tissue or bony lesion - then can it beof cutaneous origin. blood report of acute infection. skinabscess? on palpation the swelling felt like a compressible gurglingmass reminiscent of hernia.  

See his CT scan here: USG abdomen report provided with the case tells normalimpression!! is there any infection in it? why neutrophil &ESR is high?.

25 years old boy suffering from whole body pain since 2-3years. Pain is all over — muscles, joints, everywhere — and he gets tired really easily. Sleep is bad too, wakes up feeling just as exhausted as when he went to bed.

44 year old man with progressive Weight Loss since one year. Has lost a lot of weight without really trying, looks very thin now. Appetite is down and he says he feels weak and drained most of the time.
A 40 years old woman with Hypothyroidism since 5 years, irondeficiency anemia and nail changes since 2 years and progressivediffuse alopecia since 1 month: No koilonychia in this patient's nails.

A 19 year old boy with fever for 2 weeks and recent evidenceof bilateral large pleural effusion with tachypnoea and withurine showing mild proteinuria with persistent active sediment:http://www.udhc.co.in/INPUT/displayIssueGraphically.jsp...Would appreciate your inputs on the diagnosis and plan forfurther management. This http://www.udhc.co.in/ViewImage?file_id=9819&scale=800was the reason for the patient's chest pain. The tap wasinitially showing 5000 WBC predominantly polymorphs alon withhigh pleural fluid to serum protein ratios and high pleural fluidLDH, s.

50yr old male....presented with fever...tiredness....since 1week....examination febrile..no other findings....inv....denguens1 positive ...platelets were 60000....graduallyimproved.....was complaining of pain abdomen ...usgnormal...upper gi endoscopy showed gr D reflux esophagitis andchronic active duodenal ulcer.rut negative....patient continuesto have fever since 10 days started on antibiotic.....chest xraybronchitis....occasional crepts clinically...i just got a call heis desaturating ...abg....ph 7.51.po2 60..pco2 12..hco316....what am i dealing with? Shreniapologies for my delayed reply and yes the possibility ofALI is very strong given the clinical scenario. I must ask you todelete some of the images shared here as they reveal thepatient's name and this will be a threat to his privacy. Thebes.

A 14 years old boy having localized loss of hair and itchylesions in the scalp since few months sir this is case of cicatriacial alopecia please help us to take the history of this patient indetail. Sir , in this patient from the vertex on left side where wesee patches of alopecia with hyper pigmentation and atrophy usinga 4 mm punch we can take the biopsy. Clean the area and underproper asepsis after injecting 2 %lignocaine locally biopsycan.

25 year old healthcare professional develops fever, nausea andvomitting. 2 days later he has yellowing of urine. LFT showsraised enzymes beyond 2000 IU, total bilirubin 3.8. 
INR 1.07.Repeat LFT after 2 days bilirubin 6.8, SGPT 3700.2 months back he has H/O intake of PEP with Zidovudine,Lamivudine, Lopinavir, Ritonavir for 1 month.IgM anti Hep A positive.

A 74 year old man with arthritis since 2 years and recurrentintermiitent angiodedema since 2 months angioedema is not common with rheumatoid arthritis but inthis patient there is associated history of hypertension anddiabetes both which can be the factors?? angioedema could be because of autoimmune factor inrheumatoid arthritis (perhaps only one case reported) and is morecommon with other autoimmune diseases. angioedema over jointswith pain may be associated with arthritis. Today I had time to look at the pictures for the firsttime. 
I do not see the angioedema. As the angioedema is occurringtwo years after the onset of the rheumatoid arthritis, I wonderif they are connected. As I commented earlier, I would be moreconcerned about a reaction to NSAIDs. 
First we must document thatthis patient does have angioedema , how was the diagnosismade??.
A 40 year old man with irregular swelling of the right footsince 4 years Sir I have not seen this patient Sir this patient is not in my unit. Sir this patient is not in my unit.

We were unable to figure out why this 22 year old woman hadPolyarthritis for last 7 years,abdominal lymph-nodal tuberculosissince last 7 months, and pancreatitis 3 months with now recentlynoticed large liver cirrhosis and ascites.

Currently we are managing this 23 year old lady suffering fromsymptoms of malabsorption syndrome since the last 14 years whenshe was given a diagnosis of gluten sensitive enteropathy at theage of 9. No other neurological manifestations although not all ofthem may be present in all patients. The diagnosis of Coeliac wasmade 14 years back in Govt Medical College, Bhopal possibly as anassumption to see if she would respond to a gluten free diet(a Great to hear from Professor Dilawari(Santanu, Pralay, VivekJha, LakshmiKant Jha, Tarun Chakrabarti). 
We inquired and found that many laboratories in Indiahave discontinued the 72 hour Fecal fat test possibly due to theunpleasant logistic issues Please comment on:1 what were her symptoms when she was diagnosed CD.2. Was there D2 biopsy done.?.

A 40 year old woman with joint pains since 6 years. Multiple joints are affected — fingers, wrists, knees — and they feel stiff especially in the mornings. Joints look a bit swollen on and off and the pain moves around.
A 16 yr old obese girl has presented to us with acutepancreatitis and diabetes mellitus....... How do we progress toinvestigate the cause of pancreatitis in this girl? Its an interesting case.
31 year old woman with polyarthritis since 2008 All I can tell from reading the record is the patient hadrheumatoid arthritis, had a high sedimentation rate and is onmedal 4 mg daily.

65 year old woman with intermittent palpitations and chestpain since 2014. Heart starts racing suddenly out of nowhere and she gets this tight feeling in her chest along with it. Episodes come and go, sometimes with some breathlessness too.

A 21 year old man with fever, pain and swelling in his leftleg since the last 2 months. The leg is quite swollen and warm to touch, and the pain has been getting worse. He's had fever on and off through this whole time and the swelling just isn't going down.

A 40 year old man with gradual paralysis of both lower limbsand bedridden since 2 months. Started with weakness in the legs that slowly got worse until he couldn't walk at all. Also having trouble controlling bladder and bowel now.

49 year old man with intermittent right sided neck pains andright arm paralysis since the last 6 years. Neck gets very stiff and the pain shoots down into the right arm, sometimes the arm just feels weak and hard to use. Tingling and numbness in the fingers on that side too.

A 35 year old man with diabetes and skin eruptions since 3years and loss of both lower limb sensations since last 1year. The skin patches showed up first, then slowly the feet and legs started going numb — can barely feel anything below the knees now. Blood sugar has been poorly controlled for a long time.

A 45 year old man with neck & upper limb pain along withdifficulty in walking since 6 years. Arms feel weak and tingly and the neck pain is pretty constant. Walking has gotten unsteady over time, like his legs don't quite do what he wants them to.
70 year old woman with knee pains and low back ache this patient has had one of our community health workerstype her history in English.

A 60 year old woman with progressive abdominal wall tumorsince last 2 years. The lump started small but has been slowly growing and is now quite firm and visible. No major pain at first but it's been getting more uncomfortable as it gets bigger.

A 49 year old woman with vomiting and pain abdomen since 1month. Pain is mostly in the upper belly, comes and goes but has been getting worse. She says the vomiting happens after eating and she can't keep much food down.

A 59 year old man with skin lesions and breathlessness since 2months. The skin patches are reddish and spread across his chest and back, some look raised and itchy. He's also been getting winded just walking around the house.

40 year old woman with difficulty in urination since 20 years. She says she has to really strain to pass urine and the stream is very weak. Has had this so long she thought it was just normal for her.
42 year old woman with pelvic pain and irregularmenstruation. Pain is worse during her periods and sometimes during intercourse. Bleeding is heavy some months and then barely there the next.

5 year old boy with inability to talk and walk since 4 yearsof age. Parents say he was developing fine until around age 4 then suddenly stopped talking and lost the ability to walk. No clear trigger or illness they can point to around that time.

26 year old woman with anemia since the last 2 years. She feels tired all the time and gets dizzy when she stands up quickly. Her periods have been heavy for a while and she doesn't eat much meat or leafy vegetables.
32 year old woman with an intramural fibroid We are trying to get around the problem of difficult toread hand writing by asking our 'community health entrepreneur'to write with a printed hand:
A 78 year old woman with a cutaneous ulcer as well as aduodenal ulcer and renal failure This patient has again gotten admitted this time not withhematemesis but with persistent vomiting.

A 17 year old man with recurrent jaundice and night sweatssince 2 months. He's had the yellowing come and go a few times now and soaks through his clothes at night. Also says he's lost some weight without trying and feels exhausted.

A 45-year-old man having pain and burning sensation in wholebody and left frozen shoulder since six months we have planned for hot water fomentation in home and SWDND UST given along with that we have planned self stretching ndcaudmann,s pendular exercise can you support your management plan with some evidenceafter review of literature. Just google, frozen shoulder evidencebased management and let us know the salient points mentionedthere so that we can take this discussion forward. You need more history. 
All you have now is a shoulder thatwill not move. Did the patient have an injury in the past?? Couldhe have either a developmental abnormality or even past infectionin the shoulder? What about his paresthesias? What was hisneurologic exam like?

A 32 year old man with post ejaculatory urinary burning since6 years. Right after ejaculation he gets a strong burning sensation when he tries to urinate, sometimes lasting an hour or two. He's been checked for infections before but nothing was found.

during a survey conducted by our psm department i found a 35yrs old man with severe cough n dyspnoea for last one last year.cough is productive n stains d walls black or brown black. sleepis disturbed too.he works in a cement factory. case of pneumoconiosis???
A 42 year old man with stiffness and difficulty in walkingsince 6 months primarily a result of apparent cervical myelopathydue to trauma 6 months back

A 50 year old woman with DM-2 since 4-5 years and fever since2 months. The fever comes and goes, mostly in the evenings, and she's been feeling more tired and weak than usual. Her blood sugar has also been harder to control lately.

A 30-year-old man living in Boston presented to the emergencydepartment in late March with fevers and shaking chills. He mentioned he'd been hiking in a wooded area in New England a few weeks back. The chills were coming in waves and he looked pale and pretty wiped out.

A 44 year old woman with menorrhagia for your inputs http://www.udhc.co.in/INPUT/displayIssueGraphically.jsp...Will be great if some of our group members can translate therelevant sections of this patient's Bengali handwritten historyinto English. The history suggests abnormal bleeding. But the Hb (done 1yr ago) was normal.

A young man with arthritis of left ankle followed byadditional pain and swelling developing over right knee followedby additional left wrist arthritis. We were initially not sure ofthe diagnosis until one of our medical students got a goodhistory from the patient:

A 65 year old man with paralysis of right upper and lowerlimbs since 7 months. family says it started suddenly one morning, he couldn't move his right side at all. still can't grip things or walk without support.

Our recent patient from Kolkata here in Bhopal, a past weightlifter in Kolkata police, relates developing a knee dislocationonce (subsequently proven to be a cruciate ligament tear...seerecent MRI done here) and yet within months of the knee injurywent on to win a local competition by lifting a heavy weight ofmore than 600 kilos. Currently here with recurrent cellulitissince the last few years

A 10 year old child admitted with fever (intermittent) for 3months,joint pain in both knees and also back and wrist joint andthumb of left hand.Purpuric spots over abdomen,back of arm andback of thigh (both),no ecchymoses.History of moderate weightloss.Moderate pallor,swelling of both the knees and left wrist,nohemarthrosis,mild icterus.No significant bone pain.Noinvestigation reports done.What are the possible differentialdiagnoses upto this stage?

A 37 year old man having Right sided Abdominal pain since 4years and a lump since 2 years. lump has been slowly getting bigger and you can feel it when you press on the right side. pain is dull mostly but gets worse some days.
A 36 year old man with severe knee arthritis and contractures(along with involvement of other joints including hands),progressive since 2 years
A 60 year old woman with fatigue and reduced appetite for 1year. says she feels exhausted even after doing nothing and barely eats half her normal meals. lost some weight too over these months.
An 50 yr male patient having this skin problemsymptoms arewhite patches on both for arm n both of his for legshaving dryness with cracking without any oozing of fluidwith itching.

a 40 yr old man with complaints of fever, fatigue and memoryloss since 1 week. family noticed he's been confused and forgetting things he normally knows fine. fever has been on and off the whole week.

14 year old boy with Urinary incontinence, Knock knees, lowerlimb weakness and bone pains. legs look visibly bent inward and he complains his legs ache a lot, especially at night. parents say he's been leaking urine without warning for a while now.

38 year old woman with complaints of severe neck pain and handpains radiating from the right shoulder since few months. pain shoots down from the neck into the right arm and fingers, gets worse when she turns her head. sometimes her hand feels numb or tingly.

A 40 year old man with abdominal distension.for 2 years. belly has been getting progressively bigger and feels tight, clothes don't fit anymore. friends say he looks like he's carrying fluid in there.

a 17 year old boy with fever and dry cough since 15 days. fever is low grade mostly and the cough just won't go away despite trying some basic meds. otherwise he's still going to school, not completely knocked out.

30 yr old man with complaints of fever and bodyache since 4months and pain in right upper abdomen since 15 days. the right side pain is new and getting worse, feels tender when you press under the ribs. had been managing the fever at home thinking it was just a viral thing.
A young male with history of chronic alcoholism. Presents tothe emergency dept. with History of Severe abdominal pain andrespiratory distress.
Extreme Headache since 1 year. pain comes in bad episodes, sometimes on one side, and can last hours at a stretch. tried a few painkillers but they only help a little.
18 yrs young man with seizures following febrile illness alongwith forgetfulness and weakness in all 4 limbs since 8 years.

35 year old woman with low grade fever for 4 months andassociated chronic diarrhoea. stools are loose, sometimes 4-5 times a day, no blood but lots of mucus. she's lost weight and looks tired all the time.
66 year old woman with swelling in legs. both legs, worse by evening, socks leaving marks on her skin. also feels a bit breathless when climbing stairs.

75 year old smoker presented with dry cough and low gradefever since 15 days.on examination he was afebrile.no clubbing nocyanosis resp. Rate 16/min.systemic examn nl trachea central,except reduced air entry on left side with hyperresonance
70 yrs old male came with complaints of Tingling sensation inboth lower limbs since 2 months, unable to walk for 1 month, andurinary incontinence for 1 month

A 60yrs old female patient presented with the complaint ofdizziness and vomiting. room feels like it's spinning, worse when she turns her head or gets up from bed. no headache but vomited twice this morning.
36 years old woman with polyarthritis for 20 years. multiple joints involved, hands and knees mostly, stiff in the mornings for over an hour. joints look swollen and a bit deformed now.

A 57 yrs old female patient presented with dyspnea, cough withexpectoration, and mild fever. cough bringing up yellowish phlegm, been going on about a week. gets breathless even walking around the house.

27 year old woman with unexplained infertility for 2 years. periods are regular, husband's tests came back normal, she's been trying naturally with no luck. sometimes has bad cramps during periods but scans look okay so far.

70 year old man with shortness of breath and body swelling. swelling in both legs going up to the thighs, and his face looks puffy in the mornings. can't lie flat at night, needs two pillows to breathe okay.
This 45 year old woman came with cough and low grade fever of1 month duration , there is also history of significant weightloss. No hemoptysis or chest pain. No family history oftuberculosis.
This 25 year old woman came with pain and some swelling in herright wrist of four months duration. With no response to routineanti inflammatory meds. No other joints have any pain or swelling.

A 7 year old girl with a wheeze every evening since the last 3months. happens almost every day around the same time, settles a bit by night but parents are worried. no fever, but she does have a history of eczema as a baby.

a patient presents with shortness of breath, fever and araised ESR. On examination he had rash on his trunk and arms. rash is salmon-pink, comes and goes with the fever spikes. joints are also achy and he's been unwell for a few weeks now.

A 7 years old child with intermittent left lumbar abdominalpain. pain comes in waves, makes the child cry and roll around, then settles on its own. parents noticed urine looked a bit cloudy once or twice.

A 50 years old man with abdominal pain and loss of appetitesince 1 month. pain is mostly in upper belly, comes and goes but getting worse lately. also losing weight and feels full very quickly even after eating small amounts.

A 50 year old woman with Diabetes since 10 years and recentknee pains and uncontrolled blood sugars. sugars been running very high lately, not responding well to her usual medicines. knees are stiff in the morning and she's been putting on a lot of weight over the years.

A 31 year old woman with left knee pain and swelling since 6months and cough since 2 weeks. knee is swollen and warm, not getting better with painkillers. cough is dry, no fever but she's been losing some weight over the past few months.

An 18 years old girl with polyarthritis since 1 year: multiple joints involved — fingers, wrists, knees — all swollen and painful. morning stiffness lasts a couple of hours and she's also had some skin rashes on and off.

A 50 years old woman with severe right sided headache since 5days. pain is throbbing and stays on the same side, gets worse with light and noise. she's had similar headaches before but this one is lasting longer than usual.
A 70 year man with diabetes since 2 years and large boweldiarrhea since 4 months His diabetes appeared relatively well controlled but hislarge bowel diarrhea has been relentless
60 year old woman with Diabetes since 2009 and recentcellulitis As far as I can see from the records her DM duration is abt7 years..... Her sugars are pretty much uncontrolled with HbA1cabove 13..

A 45 years old woman with abdominal pain, fever and jaundicesince 2 weeks: you have seen this patient. pain is mainly in the upper right side of the belly and she's gone quite yellow — eyes and skin both. urine is dark and she's had chills with the fever.
44 yr man presented with fever, diarrhoea, dizziness &sweating. Initially BP was 100/60 with moderate dehydration. CRP50 with normal counts, Hb, Creatinine, Na/K & ECG.

A 45 years old man with chest pain since 5 months anddifficulty in breathing since 1 month. chest pain comes on when he walks or climbs stairs, goes away with rest. breathing has been getting worse lately, even small tasks leave him winded.
